SETTINGS.DEFAULT_ICON.NAME: Custom Icon
SETTINGS.DEFAULT_ICON.HINT: An image path here will replace the default icon used for the concentration effect.
SETTINGS.ITEM_ICON.NAME: Use Item Icon
SETTINGS.ITEM_ICON.HINT: If checked, the image used for concentration effects will be overridden by the item's image.
SETTINGS.PREPEND.NAME: Prepend Effect Labels
SETTINGS.PREPEND.HINT: If checked, concentration effects are prepended with 'Concentration' to distinguish them from other effects.
SETTINGS.VERBOSE.NAME: Verbose Effect Descriptions
SETTINGS.VERBOSE.HINT: If using a module like Effects Panel, and if it supports html tags, this will make the description of the effect more verbose.

WHISPER.NAME: Whisper Messages
WHISPER.HINT: If enabled, all messages about beginning or ending concentration will be whispered to owners and all GMs instead of respecting roll modes. This does not affect the save prompts, which are always whispered no matter what.

CHARACTER_FLAGS.BONUS.NAME: Concentration Bonus
CHARACTER_FLAGS.BONUS.HINT: A bonus to saving throws to maintain concentration. This field supports dynamic values such as @classes.sorcerer.levels as well as dice expressions.
CHARACTER_FLAGS.ABILITY.NAME: Concentration Ability
CHARACTER_FLAGS.ABILITY.HINT: The ability this character uses for saving throws to maintain concentration. The possible values are {keys}.
CHARACTER_FLAGS.RELIABLE.NAME: Reliable Concentration
CHARACTER_FLAGS.RELIABLE.HINT: This character cannot roll below 10 to maintain concentration.
CHARACTER_FLAGS.ADVANTAGE.NAME: Concentration Advantage
CHARACTER_FLAGS.ADVANTAGE.HINT: This character rolls with advantage to maintain concentration.

CN.SPEAKER: Concentration Notifier

CARD.PROMPT.DETAILS: {actorName} has taken {damage} damage and must make a DC {dc} {saveType} saving throw to maintain concentration on {itemName}.
CARD.PROMPT.DETAILS_MANUAL: {actorName} must make a DC {dc} {saveType} saving throw to maintain concentration on {itemName}.

CN.ITEM_NOT_FOUND: The item being concentrated on does not exist on the actor.
